byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and MATT FLEGENHEIMER

abstract: Allies of New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio are increasingly concerned about his rocky second year in office, and fret privately that his administration has not given more fanfare to his accomplishments; de Blasio's image has been bruised by perceived missteps, with 44 percent of New Yorkers disproving of his performance in latest poll.
lead_paragraph: Many allies are wondering how Mr. de Blasio, a seasoned political operative, allowed problems to add up in his second year in office.

headline.main: Messes Pile Up for de Blasio in 2nd Year
headline.print_headline: Messes Pile Up for de Blasio in 2nd Year

snippet: Many allies are wondering how Mr. de Blasio, a seasoned political operative, allowed problems to add up in his second year in office.
